item.title: In a shock offensive, insurgents breach Aleppo, Syria's largest city
item.description: Insurgents breached Syria's largest city Friday and clashed with government forces for the first time since 2016, in a surprise attack that sent resid...

item.title: Canadian Prime Minister Trudeau flies to Florida to meet with Trump after tariffs threat
item.description: Trudeau flew to Florida on Friday to have dinner with President-elect Donald Trump at his Mar-a-Lago club after Trump threatened to impose sweeping ta...

item.title: Banana art eaten, banana art purchase
item.description: Justin Sun uploaded a video of himself eating the $6.2 million absurdist piece conceptualized by Italian artist Maurizio Cattelan.

item.title: Millions are heading home from the holiday to face snow and an Artic blast
item.description: Some parts of the country will receive heavy lake-effect snow and others will see rain or dry weather with subfreezing temperatures.

item.title: A restored Notre Dame cathedral is unveiled days before its official reopening
item.description: Notre Dame Cathedral has been closed to the public since a fire damaged the landmark in April 2019.
